question_id: Tampilkan ID resep, judul resep, dan nama bahan yang disajikan dalam satuan 'lembar'.
sql_query:
SELECT
    r.id_resep AS id_resep,
    r.judul_resep AS judul_resep,
    b.nama_bahan AS nama_bahan
FROM
    resep r
JOIN
    resep_bahan rb ON r.id_resep = rb.id_resep
JOIN
    bahan b ON rb.id_bahan = b.id_bahan
WHERE
    b.satuan_default = 'lembar'
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
    r.id_resep AS id_resep,
    r.judul_resep AS judul_resep,
    b.nama_bahan AS nama_bahan
FROM
    resep r
JOIN
    resep_bahan rb ON r.id_resep = rb.id_resep
JOIN
    bahan b ON rb.id_bahan = b.id_bahan
WHERE
    b.satuan_default = 'lembar';
```
